content.question: The study of economics is primarily concerned with which of the following?

choices.label: The testing of hypotheses under controlled conditions
The allocation of scarce resources, given unlimited wants
The fair and equal treatment of all households
The provision of conclusive answers to public policy issues
The development of the dynamics of group behavior

content.answer: The allocation of scarce resources, given unlimited wants

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
